summary: The diff implements centralized replica-rejection extraction and standardized English admin-auth error messaging, updates admin login to surface controlled error text, and updates admin route token-validation gating to preserve tokens during IC0508/canister-stopped backend outages while showing an English backend-unavailable message.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated feature changes are described (e.g., GalleryPage updates, HeaderNav logout button, useLogout changes, AdminLayout routing changes, App router nesting, AdminNotFound page, useQueries updates), but these are not requested by REQ-31/32/33 and are only evidenced as claims inside a summary file rather than shown code diffs.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to admin login/token-validation handling for canister-stopped errors and standardized rejection parsing/messages; the diff summary file includes additional change descriptions outside that scope.
